channel.title: The Guntlet
channel.description: Buck Hodges recently posted about a problem with locks based on files types and shelving in VSTS Source Control. In the post he mentions a system called Gauntlet that is used internally in some teams at Microsoft. The Gauntlet system...
channel.dc:creator: Martin

item.title: Comment by Grant Holliday+00:00
item.description:
Thanks for this Martin.
I was doing the VSTS 300 level training and it referred to Gauntlet. This is a great overview of the pros/cons.
item.dc:creator: Grant Holliday
